//instructions using LW and SW- You may have to inserted NOPs to get the required result
00000000 00000000 //NOP
00000001 1C020002 //LW $2, 2($0) 
00000002 1C030003 //LW $3, 3($0) 
00000003 1C040004 //LW $4, 4($0) 
00000004 1C050005 //LW $5, 5($0) 
00000005 00431000 //ADD $2,$2,$3
00000006 00431000 //NOP
00000007 14852800 //MUL $5,$4,$5
00000008 14852800 //NOP
00000009 14852800 //NOP
0000000a 0C451000 //XOR $2,$2,$5
0000000b 0C451000 //NOP
0000000c 0C451000 //NOP
0000000d 20020006 //SW $2,6($0)
